name: Genesis AI
description: Genesis AI is a startup that aims to build a foundational model for powering all kinds of robots, focusing on automating a wide range of repetitive tasks using synthetic data generated from a proprietary physics engine.
short_description: Genesis AI develops AI models for robotics using synthetic data.

name: Mechanize
description: Developer of AI systems designed to perform any task a human can do for economic value. The company's system can do various tasks such as tax filing to copywriting, from data entry to diagnostics, from bookkeeping to basic legal work, building digital training grounds, virtual environments that simulate real-world workflows and allow AI agents to learn by doing, enabling businesses to get AI agents to reduce human workloads and streamline their operations.
short_description: AI systems developer for automating various human tasks.

name: Alta
description: Alta is an AI stylist and personal shopper that makes outfit recommendations based on users' budget, lifestyle, weather, and calendar, allowing users to try on looks with their personalized virtual avatar.
short_description: Alta is an AI-driven personal styling agent that helps users choose outfits.

name: Reflection AI
description: Reflection AI is building coding agents that can function autonomously.
short_description: A startup focused on developing autonomous coding agents.

name: Kai Ai
description: Ai software Development and Data Processing
short_description: Kai Ai specializes in AI software development and data processing.

name: Mach Industries
description: Mach Industries is a defense technology company focused on developing advanced weaponry and unmanned aerial vehicles, including a vertical takeoff precision cruise missile and a super-light jet-powered UAV.
short_description: Mach Industries develops innovative defense technologies and UAVs.

name: LGND
description: LGND is a startup that aims to enhance the efficiency of analyzing geographic data through machine learning and neural networks, specifically focusing on identifying fire breaks in satellite imagery.
short_description: LGND uses AI to improve the efficiency of geographic data analysis.
investors: Javelin Venture Partners|AENU|Clocktower Ventures|Coalition Operators|MCJ|Overture|Ridgeline|Space Capital|John Hanke|Karim Atiyeh|Suzanne DiBianca

name: Arcee.ai
description: Arcee.ai is a startup focused on leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance various business processes and decision-making.
short_description: AI-driven solutions for business optimization.

name: Deep Cogito
description: Deep Cogito is an AI research startup that has emerged from stealth with a focus on developing open source large language models (LLMs) that are fine-tuned from Meta’s Llama 3.2 and equipped with hybrid reasoning capabilities. The company aims to push the boundaries of AI by enabling models to iteratively refine their reasoning strategies and ultimately develop superintelligence.
short_description: An AI research startup focused on developing open source large language models with advanced reasoning capabilities.

name: Vellum.ai
description: Vellum.ai focuses on helping companies improve their generative AI prompting, leveraging large language models to enhance business applications.
short_description: A startup that enhances generative AI prompting for businesses.

name: LangChain
description: LangChain is an AI infrastructure startup providing tools to build and monitor LLM-powered applications, solving problems related to real-time information access and interaction with databases.
short_description: LangChain offers tools for building applications on top of LLM models.

name: Deepnight
description: Deepnight is a startup focused on developing AI-powered night vision software that aims to disrupt the traditional analog night vision technology used by the military.
short_description: Deepnight creates AI-driven solutions for digital night vision technology.

name: Exa
description: Exa is building a tool that allows AI models to perform web searches with an AI-native twist, focusing on predicting links rather than words.
short_description: A startup creating a search engine for AI models that predicts links.

name: Hightime AI
description: Hightime AI helps developers build high-accuracy, robust Natural Language APIs tailored to their specific tasks.
short_description: Hightime AI provides tailored Natural Language APIs for developers.

name: Crossing Minds
description: Crossing Minds provides AI recommendation systems to e-commerce businesses, focusing on improving personalization and recommendation systems by studying customers' on-site behavior data while ensuring privacy.
short_description: AI recommendation startup for e-commerce.

name: Alecto AI
description: Alecto AI focuses on providing solutions in the fields of SaaS, enterprise security, and privacy using AI and machine learning technologies.
short_description: Alecto AI offers AI-driven solutions for enterprise security and privacy.

name: Galen AI
description: Galen AI is focused on developing agentic AI solutions that can think and perform tasks autonomously.
short_description: Galen AI creates autonomous AI agents for various applications.

name: Nexa AI
description: Nexa AI is a startup focused on providing AI and machine learning solutions for security and privacy, as well as development tools.
short_description: Nexa AI offers innovative AI solutions for security and development.

name: Play AI
description: Play AI lets anyone clone different kinds of voices that they can use for AI-powered use cases, such as customer service.
short_description: A voice-cloning startup that enables users to create AI-generated voice clones.

name: Sakana AI
description: Sakana AI is a world-class AI research lab focused on exploring alternative approaches to foundation models that are more adaptive and resilient.
short_description: Sakana AI is at the forefront of AI innovation, pushing the boundaries of AI research.

name: DeepSeek
description: DeepSeek is a startup that has developed R1, a reasoning large language model (LLM) that competes with major AI models from established companies.
short_description: DeepSeek is an AI startup that released a competitive large language model.

name: Snowcap Compute
description: Snowcap Compute is a startup focused on developing artificial intelligence computing chips using superconducting technology, aiming to outperform existing AI systems while consuming significantly less electricity.
short_description: Snowcap Compute develops superconducting chips for AI applications.

name: Perplexity AI
description: Perplexity is an AI-powered answer engine designed to provide accurate, real-time responses to user queries.
short_description: Perplexity AI develops an AI-driven web browser that enhances user navigation and task execution.

name: Relevance AI
description: Relevance AI is a startup developing an AI agent 'operating system' to enable businesses to build teams of AI agents.
short_description: Relevance AI helps businesses create and manage AI agents for various roles.
investors: Bessemer Venture Partners|King River Capital|Insight Partners|Peak XV

name: Patronus AI
description: Patronus AI launched a new monitoring platform that automatically identifies failures in AI agent systems, targeting enterprise concerns about reliability as these applications grow more complex.
short_description: An AI safety startup providing solutions to monitor and optimize AI agent systems.

name: Palona AI
description: Palona AI offers a range of artificial intelligence technologies that boost D2C growth.
short_description: AI technologies for direct-to-consumer growth.

name: Practicus AI
description: Practicus AI provides an AI platform designed to assist legal professionals by automating tasks and reducing burnout.
short_description: An AI platform that lightens the load for attorneys.

name: Oumi
description: Oumi is a group of academics and developers dedicated to fostering greater transparency and cooperation in frontier AI.
short_description: Oumi focuses on transparency and cooperation in frontier AI.

name: Enkrypt AI
description: Achieve AI security & safety with a platform that detects and removes vulnerabilities and monitors performance for continuous insights.
short_description: A platform for AI security that identifies vulnerabilities and monitors performance.

name: BetterLungs.ai
description: BetterLungs.ai is a startup focused on leveraging artificial intelligence to improve lung health and respiratory care.
short_description: AI-driven solutions for lung health.

name: Liquid AI
description: Liquid AI is a foundation model startup that aims to advance AI technology beyond the Transformer architecture, focusing on developing convolution-based models for edge devices.
short_description: Liquid AI is revolutionizing AI for edge devices with its new Hyena Edge model.

name: Agentuity
description: Agentuity is a technology company that develops cloud-based system to enable autonomous AI agents.
short_description: A tech company focused on cloud-based autonomous AI agents.

name: Snowfire AI
description: Snowfire AI is a pioneer in decision intelligence, offering a patent-pending adaptive AI platform designed for executives to leverage internal data and external intelligence for informed decision-making.
short_description: Snowfire AI provides an adaptive AI platform for executive decision-making.

name: Autonomize AI
description: Autonomize AI provides AI agents to health systems and plans, focusing on tasks like benefits verification, care planning, and chart review, utilizing a human-in-the-loop model for compliance and explainability.
short_description: Autonomize AI offers AI agents designed for healthcare systems to improve operational efficiency.
investors: Valtruis|Cigna Ventures|Tau Ventures|Asset Management Ventures|ATX Venture Partners|Capital Factory

name: WebAI
description: WebAI is an artificial intelligence platform that offers seamless integration of cloud-based services and local devices.
short_description: An AI platform for integrating cloud services with local devices.

name: Moonvalley
description: Moonvalley is an AI video-generation startup that offers a '3D-aware' model for filmmakers, allowing them to generate video clips with more control than standard text-to-video models.
short_description: Moonvalley provides a hybrid AI video generation model aimed at democratizing filmmaking.

name: Brighthive
description: Brighthive is a fast-growing AI startup that provides a platform with seven data agents for enterprise agentic AI data analysis, orchestrating end-to-end data management and analysis workflows across all enterprise teams, regardless of their data skills.
short_description: Brighthive is an AI startup focused on enterprise data management and analysis.

name: MagicSchool AI
description: MagicSchool AI provides award-winning AI tools designed to assist educators and tackle teacher burnout, aiming to bring an AI assistant to every teacher in the world.
short_description: MagicSchool AI offers AI tools to support educators and enhance student engagement.

name: Pronto Ai
description: Pronto Ai is a video production company that provides video marketing, creation, production, and automation services.
short_description: Video production company specializing in video marketing and automation.

name: Karini AI
description: Karini AI leads in enterprise Generative AI with its no-code platform for building, deploying, and managing apps securely and efficiently.
short_description: Karini AI provides a no-code platform for enterprise Generative AI applications.

name: Rogo
description: Rogo is a financial software company that provides innovative solutions for managing financial transactions and analytics.
short_description: Rogo offers financial software solutions for transaction management.

name: Cohere
description: Enterprise AI startup Cohere has launched a new platform called North, which allows users to quickly deploy AI agents to execute tasks across various business sectors, significantly reducing task completion time.
short_description: Cohere provides a platform for deploying AI agents in business tasks.

name: Qurrent
description: Qurrent has emerged as a game-changer, pioneering a unique approach to AI by building and managing tailored 'AI workforces' that drive consistent, measurable value.
short_description: Qurrent redefines AI adoption with custom AI workforces for real business impact.

name: PIN AI
description: PIN AI is a Bay Area-based AI startup that has launched a mobile application featuring a native large language model (LLM) designed to create a personalized intelligence network, accessing user-authorized personal data to provide tailored insights.
short_description: PIN AI offers a personal AI network through a mobile app that prioritizes user privacy and data security.

name: Devin
description: Devin is an AI coding tool designed to autonomously manage coding tasks without user intervention, aiming to streamline the software development process.
short_description: An AI tool for autonomous coding task management.

name: Anysphere Inc.
description: Anysphere Inc. is the maker of Cursor, an AI-powered coding assistant that helps programmers by analyzing their actions and suggesting the next lines of code.
short_description: Anysphere Inc. develops Cursor, an AI-infused code editor for programmers.

name: v0
description: An AI-powered platform for web creation that offers an AI model optimized for front-end and full-stack web development tasks.
short_description: v0 is an AI model designed for web development tasks.
